details.arabic_diacless: اللٰه أكبر كبيرا، اللٰه أكبر كبيرا، اللٰه أكبر كبيرا، والحمد للٰه كثيرا، والحمد للٰه كثيرا، والحمد للٰه كثيرا، وسبحان اللٰه بكرة وأصيلا
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُ أَكْبَرُ كَبِيْرًا، اَللّٰهُ أَكْبَرُ كَبِيْرًا، اَللّٰهُ أَكْبَرُ كَبِيْرًا، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ كَثِيْرًا، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ كَثِيْرًا، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ كَثِيْرًا، وَسُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ بُكْرَةً وَّأَصِيْلًا
details.transliteration: Allaahu 'Akbar Kabeera, Allaahu 'Akbar Kabeera, Allaahu 'Akbar Kabeera, walhamdu lillaahi katheera, walhamdu lillaahi katheera, walhamdu lillaahi katheera, wa Subhaanallaahi bukratan wa'aseela.
details.translations: Allah is the Greatest, Most Great. Allah is the Greatest, Most Great. Allah is the Greatest, Most Great. Praise is to Allah, abundantly. Praise is to Allah, abundantly. Praise is to Allah, abundantly. Glory is to Allah, at the break of day and at its end.

details.arabic_diacless: أعوذ باللٰه من الشيطان من نفخه، ونفثه، وهمزه
details.arabic: أَعُوْذُ بِاللّٰهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ مِنْ نَفْخِهِ، وَنَفْثِهِ، وَهَمْزِهِ
details.transliteration: A 'oo<u>th</u>u billaahi minash-Shaytaan: min nafkhihi, wa nafthihi, wa hamzihi.
details.translations: I seek refuge in Allah from Satan. From his breath and from his voice and from his whisper.
details.reference: Abu Dawud 1/203, Ibn Majah 1/265, ai Ahmad 4/85. Muslim recorded a similar Hadith 1/420
